# Draft:Edward C. Dubois

Edward Church Dubois and Edward Dubois should link here
Edward Church Dubois (January 12, 1848 â€“ January 2, 1914) was chief justice of the Rhode Island Supreme Court from 1909 to 1913. He also served as Attorney General of Rhode Island and in the state legislature.
(appointed as an associate justice sometime between 1900 and 1903)
